name: combojs
description: A combobox for intelligent, responsive search and filtering.
author: Asger Hallas

scripts.clean: npm run clean:results&& npm run clean:tests&& npm run clean:lib
scripts.compile:lib: npm run compile:stylus:lib& npm run compile:coffee:lib
scripts.compile: npm run compile:lib& npm run compile:tests
scripts.watch:lib: start npm run watch:stylus:lib& start npm run watch:coffee:lib
scripts.watch: npm run watch:lib& npm run watch:tests
scripts.test:chrome: title nightwatch& nightwatch -o tests/results/reports/chrome/ -e chrome -s fails
scripts.test:ie: title nightwatch& nightwatch -o tests/results/reports/ie/ -e ie -s fails
scripts.test:firefox: title nightwatch& nightwatch -o tests/results/reports/firefox/ -e firefox -s fails
scripts.report: npm run report:chrome&& npm run report:ie&& npm run report:firefox
scripts.setup: npm run clean& npm run compile
scripts.test: npm run test:chrome&& npm run test:ie&& npm run test:firefox&& npm run report
scripts.start: npm run clean& npm run compile&& npm run watch&& start ./tests/index.html
